verses.verse: Zion hears and is glad, And the daughters of Judah rejoice Because of Your judgments, O LORD.
For You, LORD, are (Ps. 83:18) most high above all the earth; (Ex. 18:11; Ps. 95:3; 96:4) You are exalted far above all gods.

You who love the LORD, ((Ps. 34:14; Prov. 8:13; Amos 5:15; Rom. 12:9)) hate evil! (Ps. 31:23; 145:20; Prov. 2:8) He preserves the souls of His saints; (Ps. 37:40; Jer. 15:21; Dan. 3:28) He delivers them out of the hand of the wicked.
(Job 22:28; Ps. 112:4; Prov. 4:18) Light is sown for the righteous, And gladness for the upright in heart.
(Ps. 33:1) Rejoice in the LORD, you righteous, (Ps. 30:4) And give thanks at the remembrance of His holy name.

(A Song of Praise to the LORD for His Salvation and Judgment) A Psalm. [1] Oh, (Ps. 33:3; Is. 42:10) sing to the LORD a new song! For He has (Ex. 15:11; Ps. 77:14) done marvelous things; His right hand and His holy arm have gained Him the victory.
(Is. 52:10; (Luke 1:77; 2:30, 31)) The LORD has made known His salvation; (Is. 62:2; Rom. 3:25) His righteousness He has revealed in the sight of the nations.
He has remembered His mercy and His faithfulness to the house of Israel; ((Is. 49:6); Luke 3:6; (Acts 13:47; 28:28)) All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Shout joyfully to the LORD, all the earth; Break forth in song, rejoice, and sing praises.
